ygData.subject: Re: Erase the old messages, don't just hit reply.
ygData.msgSnippet: Brad, I have to disagree with you here.  Sure we don t need the 5 pages of text some people leave on but most of the time it helps to at least leave on the
ygData.messageBody:
Brad,
I have to disagree with you here. Sure we don't need the 5 pages of text
some people leave on but most of the time it helps to at least leave on the
last message. It helps people follow the discussion. I do agree with you
in the case of forums where all you have to do is see the message above it
to know what they are commenting on.

Mark

http://www.24689.com


> From: Brad Leon <Brad.Leon@...>
>
> C'mon kids! Erase the previous emails before you send yours. Scroll
scroll
> scroll. We're enchanters. We're smarter than that.
>
